hero.title: B2B PLATFORM FOR HORECA
hero.description: Here you purchase quality products at reasonable prices directly from leading manufacturers with clear delivery times and at the time you need

hotelInConstruction.ourB2Bplatform: On our B2B platform, you can purchase products accredited by international hotel brands for projects of any scale and star rating.

hotelInOperation.offer: Whether you are a boutique hotel with up to 100 rooms or a full-service hotel with over 100 rooms, on our platform you can purchase products accredited by international hotel brands for the following services of your hotel:

restaurantsAndBars.offer: On our platform, you can purchase professional equipment for the restaurant business.
restaurantsAndBars.makeARequestNow: Make a request now and get a catalog with prices for ordering goods.

services.forHotelAndRestaurantBusiness: For the hotel and restaurant business.
services.offer: We can provide the following services:
services.hotelConsultantForMarketResearch: Selection of an international hotel consultant for market research
services.architectForTheProject: Selection of an architect for the project
services.technicalConsultantForProjectManager: Selection of a technical consultant for the project (project manager)
services.specializedConsultants: Selection of specialized consultants (for fire safety, soundproofing, kitchen technology, etc.)
services.selectionAndNegotiations: Selection and negotiations with international hotel brands
services.trainings: Ã€ la carte training for hotel, restaurant, or bar staff (revenue management, etc.)

shippingAndPayment.logistics: We ensure well-established supply chains directly from suppliers. Our own warehouse in Tashkent, couriers, and transport allow us to reduce delivery times.
shippingAndPayment.paymentMethods: You can choose one of two payment options:
shippingAndPayment.cashPaymentProcess: When choosing cash payment, you wait for the courier to arrive and hand over the amount for the goods in rubles. The courier provides the goods, which can be inspected for damage, compliance with the stated conditions. The buyer signs the accompanying documents, pays the money, and receives a receipt.
shippingAndPayment.advantageOfPayingWithCash: Cash payment is also available for self-pickup from the store, payment by mail, or using a parcel locker.

contacts.location: Uzbekistan, 100100, Tashkent, Yakkasaray district, Bobur street 34
contacts.mondayToFriday: We work for you from Monday to Friday from 09:00 to 18:00

fireProtectionSystems: Fire protection systems, equipment, and furniture
motto: Develop your business in HORECA with a reliable partner. Make a request now and get a catalog with prices for ordering goods.
